text: @RealCandaceO @WholeFoods I know it’s a very hard concept for narcissistic attention seeking MAGAs  but you need to follow the the rules or you don’t shop. You are not above this virus. Don’t provoke it. Don’t bully it. You know your usual behavior won’t work on COVID19.
